code: @Test public void testExpressionMapping() throws Exception {     resultEndpoint.expectedMessageCount(1).     Map<String, Object> headers = new HashMap<>().     final String customerNumber = "CAFE-123".     final String orderNumber = "ABC-000".     headers.put("customerNumber", customerNumber).     headers.put("orderNumber", orderNumber).     ABCOrder abcOrder = new ABCOrder().     // Header value should be mapped to custId in target model     startEndpoint.sendBodyAndHeaders(abcOrder, headers).     // check results     resultEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied().     XYZOrder result = resultEndpoint.getExchanges().get(0).getIn().getBody(XYZOrder.class).     Assert.assertEquals(customerNumber, result.getCustId()).     Assert.assertEquals(orderNumber, result.getOrderId()). }
